name: Anne and the Mystery of the Hidden Assassin
name_original: Anne and the Mystery of the Hidden Assassin
description:
The first 3 days of massive development have been completed (From 03-31-2023 to 04-02-2023)

From now on, new builds are going to take a while to be released

Game is in  early development, wait for another Pre-Alpha version...

Web Version here:

Welcome

You start your adventure as a girl who has just joined a new group of visual novels, over time you notice that something strange is happening with the other members.

Will you be able to discover the cause of that?

Minimum Requirements

Android:

Android 5.0

1GB of RAM

1.2 Ghz Dual-Core Processor

Desktop

Windows 7

1GB of RAM

1.10 Ghz Dual-Core Processor

Recommended Requirements

Android:

Android 6.0

3GB of RAM

2 GHz Octa-Core Processor

Desktop

Windows 11

4GB of RAM

2 GHz Quad-Core processor
